title: Shortcut delete and menu delete act differently in table column.
description: Shortcut delete and menu delete act differently in table column.
OB: Shortcut delete and menu delete act differently in the table column.
EB: When you perform a shortcut delete or click delete in the context menu, they should have the same behavior.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the table with a group header in the software.
2. Try to delete a grid within the group header using the shortcut delete key.
3. Then, right-click on the same grid within the group header and select 'delete' from the context menu.
